Complete Step-by-Step Process with All ScreenshotsÔÉÅ

  1. Confirm Discard: Select ‚ÄúDiscard‚Äù to remove the seed from memory

  1. Return to Main Menu: You‚Äôll be returned to the main menu with no seed loaded

üßπ Memory Clearing: Discarding a seed completely removes it from device memory. This is a security best practice when switching between different seeds or when finished with operations.
